thread.title: Driver arrested, almost 4 times over legal limit
thread.title_full: Driver arrested, almost 4 times over legal limit

author: cbc
title: Driver arrested, almost 4 times over legal limit
text:
A tip from the public led to the arrest of a man who police say was driving almost four times over the legal limit of alcohol.
Placentia RCMP said a concerned citizen reported a vehicle that had been driving erratically through Dunville, headed toward Placentia.
A blue-coloured Impala was said to be in the wrong lane and almost hit oncoming traffic.
Police said a 30-year-old man was located and arrested, and that the investigation is still ongoing.
Anyone with information is asked to contact the RCMP or Crime Stoppers.
